let pokemonRepository=function(){let t=[],e="https://pokeapi.co/api/v2/pokemon/?limit=151";function n(e){"object"==typeof e&&"name"in e&&"detailsUrl"in e?t.push(e):console.log("Pokemon is not correct")}function o(t){let e=document.querySelector(".pokemon-list"),n=document.createElement("div");n.classList.add("group-list-item");let o=document.createElement("button");o.innerText=t.name,o.classList.add("button-pokemon","btn"),o.setAttribute("data-toggle","modal"),o.setAttribute("data-target","#pokemonModal"),pokemonRepository.handleButtonClick(o,t),n.appendChild(o),e.appendChild(n)}function i(t){let e=t.detailsUrl;return fetch(e).then(function(t){return t.json()}).then(function(e){t.height=e.height,t.weight=e.weight,t.image=e.sprites,t.types=e.types,t.abilities=e.abilities}).catch(function(t){console.error(t)})}function a(t){i(t).then(function(){console.log(t),function(t){let e=$(".modal-body"),n=$(".modal-title");n.empty(),e.empty();let o=$("<h1>"+l(t.name)+"</h1>"),i=$('<img class="modal-img" style="width:50%">');i.attr("src",t.image.front_default);let a=$('<img class="modal-img" style="width:50%">');a.attr("src",t.image.back_default);let p=$("<p>height: "+t.height+"</p>"),s=$("<p>weight: "+t.weight+"</p>"),c=$("<p>types: "+t.types.map(t=>t.type.name).join(", ")+"</p>"),r=$("<p>abilities: "+t.abilities.map(t=>t.ability.name).join(", ")+"</p>");n.append(o),e.append(i),e.append(a),e.append(p),e.append(s),e.append(c),e.append(r)}(t)})}function l(t){return t.charAt(0).toUpperCase()+t.slice(1)}return{add:n,getAll:function(){return t},addListItem:o,showDetails:a,loadList:function(){return fetch(e).then(function(t){return t.json()}).then(function(t){t.results.forEach(function(t){n({name:l(t.name),detailsUrl:t.url,height:t.url.height,weight:t.url.weight,image:t.url.sprites})})}).catch(function(t){console.error(t)})},loadDetails:i,handleButtonClick:function(t,e){t.addEventListener("click",function(t){a(e)})},findPokemon:function(e){$(".pokemon-list").empty(),t.forEach(t=>{l(t.name).indexOf(l(e))>-1&&o(t)})}}}();pokemonRepository.loadList().then(function(){pokemonRepository.getAll().forEach(function(t){pokemonRepository.addListItem(t)})});
